name: Goobies (itch)
description:
Controls:

WASD: Movement

Shift: Run

F: Interact

Esc/P: Pause

M: Map <- Don't forget this one its IMPORTANT

Tab: Objective Toggle

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Goobies is an educational kids show that focuses on teaching kids to prepare for the world. The importance of friendship and the ability to make new friends is essential to a child's early social development. Bring your child to explore the friendly world of Goobies. Don’t worry! Goobie, Gibby, Gabby, and Gooey will make sure to keep them in one piece place.

The show teaches children important ideas such as:

  • Colors! From Gibby's bright red to Gabby's sunny yellow, each Goobie has a different color and different traits to help kids tell them apart!
  • Exercise! Goobies encourage viewers to get some real cardio in, complete with bursts of intense running and lull periods to really build some stamina!
  • Object permanence! Yes, Timmy, we're still there even when the lights are out.

Made for the 2021 Scream Jam. If you are having any unforeseen issues with gameplay elements like the objectives, using the downloaded build instead of the browser version has a solid chance to help. If you are having any unforeseen issues with Goobies, that's impossible. Their designers assured us that they are capable of nothing but fun! And anyway, how's something in your TV going to hurt you, silly?
